signup.subtitle: Create a strong password
signup.terms: By creating an account you agree to the Homefile

reset.title: Reset your Password
reset.instruction: We will send instructions to reset your password

validation.title1: We just sent a message to
validation.title2: with a link to activate your account.
validation.alert1: If you have not received an email, please check your spam folder or

registration.instruction: To complete your Homefile registration process, please click on the button below to confirm and activate your account.
registration.notReply: Please do not reply to this email as this is not an active email account.

forms.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
forms.errorEmailNotActivated: This email has not an account associated with it

welcome.title: Welcome to Homefile
welcome.message: We are excited to have you on board. We are here to help you get started with Homefile. We prepared a few resources to help you get started. Please click on the video below to start your journey.
welcome.message2: We hope you enjoy your time with Homefile.

buildingApp.title: One moment, we’re building your homefile.
buildingApp.subtitle: We are connecting to public sources to pull the relevant information about your home into your homefile.

form.apartmentNumber: Apartment, Suite, Unit, Building, Floor, etc.
